doc.title: Lonely Toothbrush
doc.plot: Her boyfriend will put their toothbrushes in one mug. Then, Natalie is involved in the accident. A doctor could save her life but she never comes back and she becomes comatose. 1 month later, Jack visits Natalie's room in the hospital. He starts to remember their high school days. 3 months later, Jack sees his watch that was presented by Natalie for his birthday last year. 6 months later, Jack sings 'Happy Birthday' for Natalie in the room remembering her birthday last year. 1 year later, Jack wakes up and goes to bathroom to wash his face, and sees the mug with two toothbrushes in it.
